rooms.name: Walter White Residence
rooms.description: You are at the White Residence, where Walter, Skyler, and Walter Jr. live.

rooms.name: Pinkman Residence
rooms.description: You have arrived at Jesse Pinkman's house, where multiple drug deals have occurred. Be careful!

rooms.name: Los Pollos Hermanos
rooms.description: You are at Los Pollos Hermanos, a fast-food Chicken chain owned by Gustavo Fring, who is most definitely not suspicious

rooms.name: Saul Office
rooms.description: You are at the office of Saul Goodman, a gifted lawyer with the habit of committing laundering crimes

rooms.name: Walt RV
rooms.description: You are in Walt's and Jesse's RV. Try not to step over broken glass and leftover meth.

rooms.name: Tuco Headquarters
rooms.description: You are in the headquarters of Tuco Salamanca, an aggressive meth dealer with a penchant for killing and torturing

rooms.name: Fring Laundry
rooms.description: You are at Gustavo Fring's Laundry Company, a place used as a front to make high-concentration meth

rooms.name: Vamanos Control
rooms.description: You are at Vamanos Pest Control, used by Walt and Jesse to use pest-infested homes as temporary labs to make meth

rooms.name: A1A CarWash
rooms.description: You are at A1A Carwash, a place where Walt used to work as a cashier but is now used as a money laundering business

rooms.name: DEA Office
rooms.description: You are at the DEA Office, where Hank Schrader and his partners hunt down Heisenberg, Walter's pseudonym
